summary: Provides an integration layer that maps requests for Vertex AI Model Garden models to an OpenAI‑compatible chat completion interface, constructing the proper Vertex AI endpoint URLs and exposing a wrapper for generating text completions.
business_intent: Allows developers to leverage Vertex AI Model Garden models through a familiar OpenAI‑style API, simplifying integration and expanding the usable model ecosystem for applications that already support OpenAI chat completions.
